description: A short lesson to help you apply The Traveling Salesman Problem.

buildup.text: With 20 cities, there are over 60 quadrillion possible routes to check.

discovery.text: No known algorithm solves it efficiently. The best solutions are clever approximations.

quiz.question: Why can't the traveling salesman problem be solved exactly for large inputs?
options: The number of routes grows explosively
